remarks:
Define an onto function.  Definition 6.15(4) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. We use their notation ("onto" under the arrow).  For alternate definitions, see ~ dffo2 , ~ dffo3 , ~ dffo4 , and ~ dffo5 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.) 

---

 Define an onto function.  Definition 6.15(4) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. We use their notation ("onto" under the arrow).  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
statement: df-fo $p |- ( F : A -onto-> B <-> ( F Fn A /\ ran F = B ) ) $.
